other_title: El caso de Hana y Alice (Spanish)
plot: Arisugawa Tetsuko has just moved to a new house with her recently divorced mother. She becomes a transfer student at a school where a strange rumor lingers among the students. When she starts to investigate into it, she ends meeting Hana Arai, her young strange neighbor who rarely leaves the house.
ending_theme: "Fish in the Pole" by Hec & Pascal ヘクとパスカル
